import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Router, Route, Link, browserHistory, IndexRoute } from "react-router"; import "./promotionstyling.css"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import CreatePromotion from "./CreatePromotion"; import CreateStoreCluster from "./CreateStoreCluster"; import ComparePromotion from "./ComparePromotion/ComparePromotion"; import VendorSubsidy from "./VendorSubsidy/VendorSubsidy"; // import SimulatePromotion from "./PromoSImulation/PromoSimulate"; import AdGroupTab from "./Adgroup/AdGroupTab"; import PromoCalendar from "./PromoCalendar/PromoCalendar"; import RecommendedPromo from "../RecommendedPromo"; import HistoricPerformance from "./HistoricalPerformance/HistoricalPerformanceRoot"; import CalendarContent from "./CalendarContent"; import PromoSummary from "./PromoSummary"; class Subcontent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleShow = this.handleShow.bind(this); this.handleClose = this.handleClose.bind(this); this.state = { showPromoCreation: false, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: null }; } // componentDidMount(){ // this.setState({ // selectedButton: "regi1", // showPromoCompare: true, // }) // } handleClose() { this.setState({ showOffers: false }); } handleShow() { this.setState({ showOffers: true }); } showCreatePromo = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showPromoCreation: true, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: id }); }; showStoreCluster = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showClusterCreation: true, showPromoCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: id }); }; showPromoCompare = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showPromoCompare: true, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCreation: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: id }); }; showVendorSubsidy = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showVendorSubsidy: true, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: id }); }; showPromoSimulate = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showPromoSimulate: true, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showAdGroup: false, showHistoricPerformance:false, selectedButton: id }); }; showAdGroup = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showAdGroup: true, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, showHistoricPerformance:false }); }; showHistoricPerformance = (e,id) => { this.setState({ showHistoricPerformance:true, showAdGroup: false, showClusterCreation: false, showPromoCreation: false, showPromoCompare: false, showVendorSubsidy: false, showOffers: false, showPromoSimulate: false, selectedButton: id }); }; render() { return (

); } } export default Subcontent;
